BasicInfo.short: Semarchy provides the fastest time-to-value multi-domain data management software for all your reference and master data.

Products.name: Convergence™ Pulse
Products.description: Semarchy Convergence™ Pulse is our solution to measure the performance of your reference and master data project.

Products.name: Convergence™Cloud MDM
Products.description: It deploys within minutes, supports any MDM and RDM use case with all the features of Convergence™ for MDM and Convergence™ Pulse.

Products.name: Convergence™ for Address Verification and Geocoding
Products.description: Convergence™ for Address Verification and Geocoding is our solution to cleanse, match, validate and enhance your addresses.

Products.name: Convergence™ for MDM
Products.description: Convergence™ for MDM is our complete software solution to govern reference and master data.

Products.name: Convergence™ for Data Integration
Products.description: It is the next generation high-performance data integration platform that enables your IT team to deliver the right data, at the right place
